privacy.title: Personal Data
privacy.description: In accordance with GDPR, you have the right to access, modify and delete your personal data.

export.title: Export Your Data
export.description: Download an archive containing all your personal data (profile, organizations, audio files, transcriptions, documents, credit history).

deletion.title: Delete My Account
deletion.description: Request the permanent deletion of your account and all your data. This action is irreversible.
deletion.warning: Warning: Deleting your account will result in the permanent loss of all your data after a 30-day period.
deletion.pendingDescription: Your account will be deleted on {date}. You have {days} days left to cancel this request.

orphanOrgs.title: Organizations to Manage
orphanOrgs.description: You are the sole owner of these organizations. Before deleting your account, please manage each one.
orphanOrgs.soloOrgsDescription: You are the only member of these organizations. They will be automatically deleted with your account.
orphanOrgs.withMembersDescription: These organizations have other members. Choose to transfer ownership or delete them.
orphanOrgs.deleteAllMembersWarning: All members will lose access to this organization

errors.missingDecisions: Please choose an action for each organization

restriction.title: Restricted Access - Account Pending Deletion
restriction.description: Your account is scheduled for deletion. Access to the application is temporarily restricted. You can cancel the deletion, export your data, or log out.

shared.seoDescription: View the audio analysis shared with you
shared.notFoundDescription: This share link does not exist or has been revoked.

createOrganization.errorDescription: An error occurred while creating the organization.

validation.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters

pendingDeletion.title: Account Pending Deletion
pendingDeletion.description: Your account is scheduled for deletion. During this period, access to the application is restricted.
pendingDeletion.info: You can cancel the deletion or export your data before the deadline.

usage.title: Terms of Use
usage.content: By using our service, you agree to comply with our terms of use. This service is intended for professional use for transcription and analysis of audio content.

privacy.title: Data Protection
privacy.content: We take the protection of your data seriously. Your audio files and analyses are processed confidentially and are never shared with third parties without your consent.

limitations.title: Limitation of Liability
limitations.content: Our service is provided "as is". We do not guarantee perfect accuracy of transcriptions and analyses. The user is responsible for verifying the generated content.

dataCollection.title: Data Collected
dataCollection.content: We collect data necessary for our audio transcription and analysis service to function:

items.audio: Uploaded audio files and generated transcriptions

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content: Your data is used exclusively to provide our transcription and analysis services. We never sell your data to third parties and do not use it for advertising purposes.

thirdParties.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParties.content: We use GDPR-compliant third-party services to process your data:

items.mistral: Mistral AI: AI processing for transcription and analysis. Zero data retention enabled - your audio files are not stored.
items.resend: Resend: Transactional email service (servers in the United States, covered by Standard Contractual Clauses).

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: Your data is retained as long as your account is active. Upon account deletion, all your personal data is permanently erased within 30 days.

rights.title: Your GDPR Rights
rights.content: Under the General Data Protection Regulation, you have the following rights:

items.access: Right of access: obtain a copy of your personal data
items.rectification: Right to rectification: correct inaccurate data
items.deletion: Right to erasure: request deletion of your data
items.portability: Right to data portability: receive your data in a structured format
items.opposition: Right to object: object to the processing of your data

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding the protection of your data or to exercise your rights, you can contact us at: support{'@'}dh-echo.app

publisher.title: Website Publisher
publisher.content: DH-Echo is an audio transcription and analysis service powered by artificial intelligence. The service is published by [Company Name], [Legal Form], with a capital of [Amount] euros. Registered office: [Address]. Company registration: [Registration Number]. VAT number: [VAT Number].

hosting.title: Hosting
hosting.content: The website is hosted by [Hosting Provider Name], [Hosting Provider Address]. The publication director is [Director Name].

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on this website (texts, images, logos, interface) is protected by copyright and trademark law. Any reproduction, representation, or distribution, in whole or in part, without express authorization is prohibited.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions or complaints, you can contact us at: support{'@'}dh-echo.app

what.title: What is a Cookie?
what.content: A cookie is a small text file stored on your device when you visit our website. It allows us to remember certain information to improve your user experience.

types.title: Types of Cookies Used
types.content: We only use cookies strictly necessary for the service to function:

essential.name: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for authentication and session security.

preferences.name: Preference Cookies
preferences.description: Allow us to remember your preferences (language, dark/light theme).

management.title: Cookie Management
management.content: You can configure your browser to refuse cookies. However, this may affect the functionality of some service features.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: We do not use advertising tracking cookies or social network cookies. No third-party cookies are placed for advertising targeting purposes.
